Content:: Udayana Chaminda Kirindigoda is a Sri Lankan lawyer, politician and Member of Parliament.[1] He's the son of late attorney Upali Kirindigoda. He has studied at Dharmaraja College Kandy and Sri Lanka Law College . Kirindigoda is a member of Viyathmaga (Path of the Learned), , businesspeople and professionals.[2][3] He contested the 2020 parliamentary election as a Sri Lanka People's Freedom Alliance electoral alliance candidate in Kandy District and was elected to the Parliament of Sri Lanka.[4][5][6]  This article about a politician from Central Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Udayana Kirindigoda - Wikipedia
